## ConditionUnsatisfied class

Error thrown when a store modification is rejected because the condition specified in the request wasn't met.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare class ConditionUnsatisfied extends NotOK 
```
**Extends:** [NotOK](./core.notok.md)

## Remarks

The constructor for this class is marked as internal. Third-party code should not call the constructor directly or create subclasses that extend the `ConditionUnsatisfied` class.
